creditline: Gift of the John C. Weber Collection
description: painting of a woman at L, looking down and to right, holding a blue origami crane; woman has black hair in ornate style and is wearing green kimono; painting on silk with paper support; in brown frame, unglazed, with tan silk mat
medium: Ink and color on silk, paper
signed: TL, black ink, signed: Chosetsu [?]; TL, red seal: Kikusaburo
title: Woman with Origami Bird
